title: vaDivazhaguDaiya
sahitya:
vaDivazhaguDaiya vElan aDi tozhudiDa vENum paDi idil paTTiDum pADellAm viTTODa


anupallavi

  paDai pOl vandaDaiyum bhaktarukkiDai viDAdu koDai aLLi vIsak-kai konjamum kUsiDAda


caraNam    kaDalOrak-kOyililE kuDiyEri sIruDan karuNaik-kaDalOvenum uruvODu varuvOrkku
IDarEDum toDarAda iru lOka sukha bhOgam Ivadil iNaiyillAda dEvakunjari nAthan
